item.Title: CQ x 2{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Short CQ call, stops TX when all text sent. # #-- # CQ CQ de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> CQ CQ de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> PSE K <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: CQ x 3{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Longer CQ call, stops TX when all text sent. # #-- # CQ CQ de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> CQ CQ de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> CQ CQ de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> PSE K <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: QRZ{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # QRZ, stops TX when all text sent. # #-- # QRZ QRZ QRZ de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> <my:callsign> pse k <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Him de Me{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Start of a reply to the other station, his callsign # is taken from the Add Log Entry Callsign field. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Him de Me Pse K{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # End of a reply to the other station, his callsign # is taken from the Add Log Entry Callsign field. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> pse kn <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Report, Name, QTH{{EOR}}
Station{{EOR}}
item.Definition:
#++ # # All the toys in use at my station. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign>
<his:name>, my station Radio : <my:radio>, <my:power>, <my:interface> Software : HRD + <my:program> Antenna : <my:antenna> Operator : Created 1957, licenced 1974
My QSL is OK via eQSL.cc or via the bureau.
BTU <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> kn <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: MFSK Picture{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Send a picture (must be in MFSK mode). # #-- # Here is a picture <send-pic>I do hope you like it!{{EOR}}

item.Title: Logbook Statistics{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Statistics from the logbook, make sure the current QSO is add before # using these tags. To add the current QSO use <add-log>. # # <qso-mode-count> returns the number of QSOs in the logbook for the # current ADIF mode. # # <qso-total-count> returns the total number of QSOs in the logbook. # #-- # <add-log> you are <qso-mode> QSO # <qso-mode-count> in my logbook.{{EOR}}

item.Title: WX{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The weather, values from the Tags. # #-- # Weather here is <my:weather> temp is <my:temperature>{{EOR}}

item.Title: BTU{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Hand over to the other station. # #-- # So BTU <his:name>, <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> k <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: 73{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The end of the QSO, 73 and thanks for the QSO. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> <add-log>73 <his:name> and thanks for <qso-mode> QSO <qso-mode-count> on <his:band>. <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> sk <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: 73 (long){{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The end of the QSO, 73 and thanks for the QSO. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> 73 <his:name> and thanks for this <my:mode> QSO on <his:band>, good DX in 2007. <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> sk <add-log> <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: 73 (Xmas){{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The end of the QSO, 73, Happy Christmas and thanks for the QSO. # #-- # <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> 73 and thanks for this <my:mode> QSO on <his:band>. Happy Christmas and a Peaceful New Year. <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> <add-log> k <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: 73 (video){{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # The end of the QSO, 73 and thanks for the QSO. # Sends 73 using the video ID option <ident:73>. # #-- # <ident:73><his:callsign> de <my:callsign> 73 <his:name> and thanks for this <my:mode> QSO on <his:band>, good DX in 2007. <his:callsign> de <my:callsign> sk <add-log> <stop>{{EOR}}

item.Title: Testing{{EOR}}
item.Definition: #++ # # Just for testing purposes. # #-- # Testing Testing Testing de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> <my:callsign> Testing Testing Testing de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> <my:callsign> Testing Testing Testing de <my:callsign> <my:callsign> <my:callsign> Closing <stop>{{EOR}}
